Key: What are you doing, Tonomachi?

Whoa! O-Oh. It's you, Itsuka. Don't scare me
like that.

What are you doing behind this building?
Besides sneaking around and hiding.

Actually... This morning, there was a letter in
my shoebox.
What?! H-Hey, is that...

Shhh! Keep it down, Itsuka... That's right.
It's a love letter. There's no mistake.
Are you serious...?

(I can't believe someone actually has a crush
on this guy...!)

So, did the mysterious sender ask you to meet
here? If so, why are you hiding?
No. I'm not certain if this is the meeting spot.

Why? Isn't it in the letter? They said meet
behind this building, right?
When did I say it was addressed to me?
...Huh?

It was someone in the class next to us who was
supposed to receive the letter. Actually, I don't
know his name. I just found the letter.

So in other words, this has nothing to do with
you. You're snooping around random locations,
and hoping to find someone.
That's correct.
This is low, even for you.

Shut up! I won't let ANYONE get in the way
of my happiness! Nothing can stop me...
No one can stop me.
Talk about bitter.

You wouldn't understand since you get to be
lovey-dovey with Tohka-chan!
Oh, is that so? Hm... Someone's coming.
Hrm! Someone's coming from that direction too!
They're both guys, huh?
Yeah. Not something you see every day.
Should we head back...?
...Yeah, we should.

(We both quietly left our hiding spot. Though
I walked a meter behind Tonomachi.)
